entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 10:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
